alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 13 at 2:26AM EDT until March 14 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 PM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations around a light glaze. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Preston and Eastern Tucker Counties. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 8 AM EDT this morning. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 2 PM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
